item.title: IBM Platform HPC V3.2: GPU Management with NVIDIA CUDA 5
item.description: IBM Platform HPC V3.2 is easy-to-use, yet comprehensive technical computing cluster management software. It includes as standard GPU scheduling, managementand monitoring capabilities for systems equipped with NVIDIA Tesla GPUs.
